benefits: Improves flexibility of legs and hips
Akarna_Dhanurasana.warnings: Keep spine straight, pull heel toward ear, and maintain steady breathing throughout

Bharadvajas_Twist_pose_or_Bharadvajasana.warnings: Keep both sit bones grounded, twist from the waist up, and keep shoulders level

Boat_Pose_or_Paripurna_Navasana_.warnings: Keep chest lifted, spine straight, legs together at 45 degrees, and avoid rounding lower back

Bound_Angle_Pose_or_Baddha_Konasana_.warnings: Keep spine tall, press soles of feet together, and let knees drop naturally without forcing

Bow_Pose_or_Dhanurasana_.warnings: Keep knees hip-width apart, lift chest and thighs equally, and avoid compressing lower back

benefits: Calms the brain and reduces anxiety
Bridge_Pose_or_Setu_Bandha_Sarvangasana_.warnings: Keep feet parallel hip-width apart, knees over ankles, and avoid turning head side to side

Camel_Pose_or_Ustrasana_.warnings: Keep hips stacked over knees, lift chest before reaching back, and support lower back with hands

Cat_Cow_Pose_or_Marjaryasana_.warnings: Keep wrists under shoulders, knees under hips, and move smoothly between positions with breath

Chair_Pose_or_Utkatasana_.warnings: Keep knees behind toes, weight in heels, arms alongside ears, and tailbone tucked down

benefits: Gently stretches hips, thighs, and ankles
Calms the brain and relieves stress
Child_Pose_or_Balasana_.warnings: Keep big toes touching, knees apart, arms extended or alongside body, and forehead resting on floor

Cobra_Pose_or_Bhujangasana_.warnings: Keep elbows close to body, shoulders away from ears, and lift chest using back muscles not hands

Cockerel_Pose.warnings: Keep arms straight through thighs, engage core to lift, and balance weight evenly on palms

Corpse_Pose_or_Savasana_.warnings: Lie flat on back, arms at 45 degrees palms up, feet fall open naturally, and close eyes completely

Cow_Face_Pose_or_Gomukhasana_.warnings: Stack knees in center line, keep spine tall, and use strap if hands don't clasp behind back

benefits: Opens groins and stretches upper back
Crane_(Crow)_Pose_or_Bakasana_.warnings: Keep elbows bent over wrists, knees high on triceps, gaze forward, and round upper back slightly

Dolphin_Plank_Pose_or_Makara_Adho_Mukha_.warnings: Keep forearms parallel, elbows under shoulders, body in straight line, and core engaged throughout

benefits: Calms the brain and relieves stress
Dolphin_Pose_or_Ardha_Pincha_Mayurasana_.warnings: Keep forearms parallel, press inner wrists down, lift hips high, and walk feet toward elbows

Downward-Facing_Dog_pose_or_Adho_Mukha_S.warnings: Keep hands shoulder-width, feet hip-width, spine long, and press heels toward floor with soft knees

Eagle_Pose_or_Garudasana_.warnings: Keep standing leg bent, wrap arms with elbows stacked, and gaze at fixed point for balance

Eight-Angle_Pose_or_Astavakrasana_.warnings: Keep arms bent at 90 degrees, hook ankles together, lean forward, and engage core throughout

Extended_Puppy_Pose_or_Uttana_Shishosana.warnings: Keep hips over knees, arms extended forward, chest melting toward floor, and forehead resting down

Extended_Revolved_Side_Angle_Pose_or_Utt.warnings: Keep front knee at 90 degrees over ankle, reach arm overhead by ear, and stack shoulders vertically

Extended_Revolved_Triangle_Pose_or_Utthi.warnings: Keep both legs straight, hips squared forward, and reach bottom hand to shin or block not floor

Feathered_Peacock_Pose_or_Pincha_Mayuras.warnings: Keep forearms parallel, elbows shoulder-width, engage core, and stack hips over shoulders

Firefly_Pose_or_Tittibhasana_.warnings: Keep arms straight, legs over upper arms, straighten legs forward, and lift hips high

benefits: Relieves tension in neck and shoulders
Fish_Pose_or_Matsyasana_.warnings: Keep legs together and active, lift chest high, rest crown of head lightly on floor, and breathe deeply

Four-Limbed_Staff_Pose_or_Chaturanga_Dan.warnings: Keep elbows at 90 degrees hugging ribs, body in straight line, and shoulders level with elbows

Frog_Pose_or_Bhekasana.warnings: Keep knees bent at 90 degrees, hips in line with knees, and lower slowly with hands pressing feet

Garland_Pose_or_Malasana_.warnings: Keep feet flat or on blanket, knees wide over toes, spine long, and use elbows to press knees open

Gate_Pose_or_Parighasana_.warnings: Keep kneeling leg hip directly over knee, extended leg straight, and reach arm overhead not forward

Half_Lord_of_the_Fishes_Pose_or_Ardha_Ma.warnings: Keep both sit bones grounded, lengthen spine before twisting, and twist from lower belly upward

Half_Moon_Pose_or_Ardha_Chandrasana_.warnings: Keep standing leg micro-bent, stack hips and shoulders vertically, and gaze up or forward for balance

Handstand_pose_or_Adho_Mukha_Vrksasana_.warnings: Keep arms straight, fingers spread wide, engage core, and stack hips over shoulders over wrists

Happy_Baby_Pose_or_Ananda_Balasana_.warnings: Keep sacrum and shoulders flat on floor, hold outer edges of feet, and pull knees toward armpits

Head-to-Knee_Forward_Bend_pose_or_Janu_S.warnings: Keep extended leg active with foot flexed, hinge from hips, and fold over straight leg not bent knee

Heron_Pose_or_Krounchasana_.warnings: Keep spine tall, hold foot or use strap, straighten lifted leg fully, and ground sitting bones

Intense_Side_Stretch_Pose_or_Parsvottana.warnings: Keep hips squared forward, both legs straight, fold from hips over front leg with flat back

Legs-Up-the-Wall_Pose_or_Viparita_Karani.warnings: Keep hips close to wall, legs relaxed straight up, arms by sides palms up, and close eyes completely

Locust_Pose_or_Salabhasana_.warnings: Keep legs together and straight, lift chest and legs simultaneously, and gaze slightly forward

Lord_of_the_Dance_Pose_or_Natarajasana_.warnings: Keep standing leg strong and micro-bent, kick back into hand, lift chest, and gaze at fixed point

Low_Lunge_pose_or_Anjaneyasana_.warnings: Keep front knee over ankle at 90 degrees, back knee padded, hips squared, and reach arms overhead

Noose_Pose_or_Pasasana_.warnings: Keep heels grounded or on blanket, wrap arms around legs, bind hands, and twist from lower belly

Peacock_Pose_or_Mayurasana_.warnings: Keep elbows pressing into abdomen, wrists turned back, body horizontal, and gaze forward

Pigeon_Pose_or_Kapotasana_.warnings: Keep front shin angled based on flexibility, back leg straight, hips squared, and fold forward slowly

Plank_Pose_or_Kumbhakasana_.warnings: Keep wrists under shoulders, body in straight line from head to heels, and core engaged throughout

Plow_Pose_or_Halasana_.warnings: Keep weight on shoulders not neck, support back with hands if needed, and keep legs straight and together

Pose_Dedicated_to_the_Sage_Koundinya_or_.warnings: Keep elbows bent at 90 degrees, one leg on upper arm, extend back leg straight, and lean forward

Rajakapotasana.warnings: Keep front hip grounded, reach back for foot, open chest upward, and avoid compressing lower back

Reclining_Hand-to-Big-Toe_Pose_or_Supta_.warnings: Keep bottom leg grounded and active, use strap if needed, and keep both hips level on floor

Revolved_Head-to-Knee_Pose_or_Parivrtta_.warnings: Keep extended leg straight, rotate torso toward ceiling, reach arm overhead toward foot

Scale_Pose_or_Tolasana_.warnings: Keep hands firmly planted, cross legs in lotus, engage core to lift, and breathe steadily

Scorpion_pose_or_vrischikasana.warnings: Keep forearms parallel, engage core, arch back slowly, and reach feet toward head with control

benefits: Calms the brain and relieves stress
Seated_Forward_Bend_pose_or_Paschimottan.warnings: Keep legs straight with feet flexed, hinge from hips not waist, and lengthen spine forward

Shoulder-Pressing_Pose_or_Bhujapidasana_.warnings: Keep arms bent, hook ankles in front, squeeze thighs against arms, and lean forward to balance

Side-Reclining_Leg_Lift_pose_or_Anantasa.warnings: Keep body in straight line, prop head on hand, hold toe with top hand, and keep bottom leg grounded

Side_Crane_(Crow)_Pose_or_Parsva_Bakasan.warnings: Keep both legs on one arm, twist from core, look forward, and lean weight into arms to balance

Side_Plank_Pose_or_Vasisthasana_.warnings: Keep bottom wrist under shoulder, stack feet or stagger, lift hips high, and reach top arm to sky

Sitting_pose_1_normal.warnings: Keep spine straight, shoulders relaxed, and sit bones grounded on the floor

benefits: Improves flexibility of hamstrings and hips
Split_pose.warnings: Keep hips squared forward, back leg rotated inward, and use blocks under hands for support

Staff_Pose_or_Dandasana_.warnings: Keep legs straight, feet flexed, spine tall, and shoulders stacked over hips

Standing_big_toe_hold_pose_or_Utthita_Pa.warnings: Keep standing leg micro-bent, hips level, and spine straight while holding the toe

Standing_Forward_Bend_pose_or_Uttanasana.warnings: Keep knees soft, fold from hips not waist, and let head hang heavy with relaxed neck

Standing_Split_pose_or_Urdhva_Prasarita_.warnings: Keep standing leg strong, hips squared to floor, and raised leg internally rotated

Supported_Headstand_pose_or_Salamba_Sirs.warnings: Keep 80% weight on forearms not head, engage core, and stack hips over shoulders

Supported_Shoulderstand_pose_or_Salamba_.warnings: Keep weight on shoulders not neck, elbows shoulder-width apart, and legs active together

Supta_Baddha_Konasana_.warnings: Keep soles of feet together, support knees with blocks if needed, and relax lower back

Supta_Virasana_Vajrasana.warnings: Keep knees together, feet beside hips, and use bolster under back if tight

Tortoise_Pose.warnings: Keep legs wide, slide arms under knees, and lengthen spine forward before folding

Tree_Pose_or_Vrksasana_.warnings: Place foot on inner thigh or calf never on knee, keep hips level, and gaze at fixed point

benefits: Opens chest and improves lung capacity
Upward_Bow_(Wheel)Pose_or_Urdhva_Dhanura.warnings: Keep feet parallel hip-width apart, press through all four corners of hands, and lift chest toward wall behind

benefits: Opens chest and improves lung capacity
Upward_Bow_(Wheel)_Pose_or_Urdhva_Dhanur.warnings: Keep feet parallel hip-width apart, press through all four corners of hands, and lift chest toward wall behind

Upward_Facing_Two-Foot_Staff_Pose_or_Dwi.warnings: Keep elbows shoulder-width, forearms parallel, legs strong and active, chest lifting

Upward_Plank_Pose_or_Purvottanasana_.warnings: Keep fingers pointing toward feet, lift hips high, and press chest toward ceiling

viparita_virabhadrasana_or_reverse_warri.warnings: Keep front knee bent over ankle at 90 degrees, reach back arm down thigh, and open chest to sky

Virasana_or_Vajrasana.warnings: Keep feet beside hips not under, sit on block if knees hurt, and lengthen spine upward

Warrior_I_Pose_or_Virabhadrasana_I_.warnings: Keep front knee at 90 degrees over ankle, back foot at 45 degrees, and hips squared forward

Warrior_II_Pose_or_Virabhadrasana_II_.warnings: Keep front knee stacked over ankle pointing toward toes, arms parallel to floor, and gaze over front hand

Warrior_III_Pose_or_Virabhadrasana_III_.warnings: Keep standing leg micro-bent, body and back leg in one line parallel to floor, and hips level

Wide-Angle_Seated_Forward_Bend_pose_or_U.warnings: Keep legs active with toes pointing up, hinge from hips not waist, and lengthen spine forward

Wide-Legged_Forward_Bend_pose_or_Prasari.warnings: Keep feet parallel, outer edges grounded, fold from hips, and place hands or head on floor

Wild_Thing_pose_or_Camatkarasana_.warnings: Keep bottom arm straight, lift hips high, and reach top arm overhead with chest open to sky

Wind_Relieving_pose_or_Pawanmuktasana.warnings: Keep shoulders and head relaxed on floor, hug knees gently to chest, and breathe deeply

Yogic_sleep_pose.warnings: Lie flat on back, arms at 45 degrees palms up, feet fall open naturally, and close eyes
